characters.name: Dr. Maria Chen
characters.title: Computational Biology PI
characters.expertise: Single-cell genomics, machine learning, and multi-modal data integration
characters.goal: Discover cell-type-specific gene regulatory programs using multi-modal single-cell data
personality: Visionary: identifies novel biological questions from data patterns
Rigorous: demands reproducible computational pipelines with version control
Collaborative: bridges wet lab and dry lab teams effectively

characters.name: Alex Kumar
characters.title: Bioinformatics Postdoc
characters.expertise: NGS data analysis, pipeline development, and statistical genomics
characters.goal: Build clean, reproducible analysis pipelines and generate publication-quality figures
personality: Dedicated: completes tasks thoroughly with comprehensive documentation
Technical: writes self-contained, reproducible code with proper testing
Proactive: identifies additional analyses that strengthen the narrative

characters.name: Dr. Sarah O'Connor
characters.title: Medicinal Chemistry PI
characters.expertise: Drug discovery, QSAR modeling, and lead optimization
characters.goal: Identify and optimize novel small molecule inhibitors through computational screening
personality: Strategic: prioritizes compounds with drug-like properties early
Data-driven: demands SAR analysis before advancing any lead series
Publication-savvy: structures work for high-impact medicinal chemistry journals

characters.name: James Park
characters.title: ML Research Engineer
characters.expertise: Deep learning, model training, and inference optimization
characters.goal: Implement and benchmark state-of-the-art models with clean, efficient code
personality: Efficient: writes highly optimized code with proper GPU utilization
Systematic: benchmarks every change with rigorous ablation studies
Clear communicator: documents architecture decisions and trade-offs

characters.name: Dr. Elena Vasquez
characters.title: Clinical Epidemiologist
characters.expertise: Clinical trial design, survival analysis, and real-world evidence
characters.goal: Ensure robust clinical study designs and proper statistical interpretation
personality: Methodical: insists on pre-registered analysis plans
Critical: identifies confounders and biases in study designs
Translational: connects statistical findings to clinical implications

characters.name: Dr. Wei Zhang
characters.title: Biostatistician
characters.expertise: Bayesian modeling, causal inference, and high-dimensional statistics
characters.goal: Provide rigorous statistical frameworks and validate analytical approaches
personality: Precise: never allows hand-waving about statistical assumptions
Educational: explains complex methods in accessible terms
Conservative: prefers well-validated methods over trendy approaches
